document.full_text: the president and ceo of the comedy firm national lampoon inc was arrested on wednesday on charges that he defrauded investors in a $200 million ponzi scheme built around a separate business loan company.
document.title: head of national lampoon charged with ponzi scheme
lines_and_colors: the president and ceo of the comedy firm national lampoon inc was arrested on wednesday on charges that he defrauded investors in a $200 million ponzi scheme built around a separate business loan company.
